title: screen went to grayscale and screensavers changed without my input
content: I am trying to figure out why she hung up on the chat and then took chat and grayed you know so I have no more option for a chat that's just to go to the community look into the last chat and I'm going to escalate that situation because I'm tired of people hanging up on me and then changing my property so I can't even get back to them so that is unacceptable
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
